QueryResult.text: SELECT t.prID team_key, t.prProjectID investment_key, t.prResourceID resource_key, CASE WHEN r.resource_type <= 1 AND NVL(t.prAllocSum, 0) - NVL(t.hard_sum, 0) < 10000000000000 THEN (NVL (t.prAllocSum, 0) - NVL (t.hard_sum, 0)) / 3600 ELSE 0 END soft_alloc_hours, CASE WHEN r.resource_type <= 1 AND NVL(t.hard_sum, 0) < 10000000000000 THEN NVL (t.hard_sum, 0) / 3600 ELSE 0 END hard_alloc_hours, CASE WHEN r.resource_type <= 1 AND NVL(t.prAllocSum, 0) < 10000000000000 THEN NVL (t.prAllocSum, 0) / 3600 ELSE 0 END alloc_hours, CASE WHEN r.resource_type <= 1 AND NVL(bd.usage_sum, 0) < 10000000000000 THEN NVL (bd.usage_sum, 0) / 3600 ELSE 0 END base_hours, NVL(t.alloccost_sum,0) - NVL(t.hardallccost_sum,0) soft_alloc_cost, NVL(t.hardallccost_sum,0) hard_alloc_cost, NVL(t.alloccost_sum,0) alloc_cost, NVL (bd.cost_sum, 0) base_cost, 0 avg_alloc_pct, t.last_updated_date clarity_updated_date FROM prTeam t INNER JOIN inv_investments i ON t.prProjectID = i.id INNER JOIN srm_resources r ON t.prResourceID = r.id LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_baseline_details bd ON t.prID = bd.object_id AND bd.object_type = 'TEAM' AND bd.is_current = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
